articles.description: As per RBI's KYC guidelines, banks need to periodically update customer identification documents
articles.content:
Reserve Bank of India (RBI) governor Shaktikanta Das on December 7 said customers do not need to visit the bank to update their details.
Customers can do re-KYC (know your customer) online except wh… [+1357 chars]
